regex.name: cats
regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url = ''): from resources.lib.modules import cache,client,workers import re,urllib,xbmc,xbmcgui u = client.request('http://www.dvdsreleasedates.com') e = re.findall('w33.+?f=\'([^\']*)\'>([^<]*)', u) e = [('http://www.dvdsreleasedates.com' + i[0] + '?sort=4&startdate=1995&enddate=2017', i[1]) for i in e if 'genre' in i[0]] return e

regex.name: makelist
regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url = ''): from resources.lib.modules import cache,client,workers import re,urllib,xbmc,xbmcgui u = client.request('[cats.param1]') e = re.findall('dvdcell.+?rc=\'([^\']*).+?\'>([^<]*).+?title\/([^\/]*)', u) e = [(i[0], i[1], i[2],i[0].split('-')[-1].split('.')[0]) for i in e] return e
